main: ^Question: Reading before bedtime can improve sleep quality.
^This health advice, supported by sleep specialists, promotes the practice of relaxing with a good book for improved sleep. (Press 'Space' to choose)
answer: ^Reading before bedtime has been suggested by sleep specialists as a relaxing and beneficial pre-sleep activity.
^Enjoying a good book can make falling asleep easier and improve sleep quality.
^This tip fits well with the idea of having a bedtime routine that helps you relax.
